meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>advance</kanji> and <kanji>attack</kanji>! This is a <vocabulary>charge</vocabulary> on someone or something, though it can also be an <vocabulary>advance</vocabulary> on them. Yep, this is the 進撃 from 進撃の巨人, the popular anime and manga. Don't say you never learned anything useful here.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the ones you learned with the kanji. Advance! Charge! Move on to the next item!
